timeline.message:
#5708 Fix Dynamic Deck with Options defined

A dynamic deck with "conf" (Deck Options) defined will crash the
reviewer.

This adds a task to "Check Database" to remove Deck Options from any
dynamic decks.

We also set CHECK_DB_AT_VERSION, so we automatically apply this fix.
